title: Lysistrata
description: Binding: paper with collotype (?) designs in brown, red, and blue; brown label attached, printed lettering; endpapers: white wove; slip case: paper over cardboard inner sleeve, blue, stamped lettring; lined with designs matching book sides, slip case of paper over cardboard, blue; type: Linotype Caslon; 118 pp.
